scripts.zip-desktop: npm run dmg-desktop && zip -r -y dist/AirDash-Win32.zip dist/AirDash-win32-x64
scripts.upload-desktop: rsync -a dist/AirDash.dmg root@flown.io:/var/www/flown.io/airdash --stats --progress && rsync -a dist/airdash-win32.zip root@flown.io:/var/www/flown.io/airdash --stats --progress
scripts.deploy-desktop: npm run build-desktop && npm run zip-desktop && npm run upload-desktop
scripts.deploy-all: npm run deploy-web && npm run deploy-desktop && npm version minor
